root: ^Yo what's up, working so late eh ?
^Yeah, we cannot rest while children keep disappearing out there
^Just this morning, we recieved another missing report

main: ^* What should I ask him ? (If there are no more choices, keep advancing the story)

c-0: ^His name is Henry, a 7 year-old boy lived a couple blocks from here
c-1: ^Henry said that he came over to his friend for a overnight party
^His mother called to his friends, they said that Henry had never shown up at the party
^Here you can have a copy of the report

ending: ^* I think I have enough information for now
^No problem, you helped us a lot in these investigation
^You may have already known by now
^A dead body was found at Lakeville Bridge
^It turned out the victim was in the missing list
^Looks like our kidnappers, or should I say murderers had made his move
^We need to act fast, or the missings will be killed
^I know, my son is also on the line right now
^While talking to people or interacting with objects, press Z to open inventory and use the items
